column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////I have been here twice now and can say the food is so good. I love the southern flare of the menu. The shrimp and grits is my favorite dish by far
column2: however there aren't many (if any) vegetarian options and for brunch no substitutions or amendments can be made so that makes it tough to find what to order. Â The drinks are good but not great
column3: but overall a great place to have a group meal.
